message: Let's start with a fair but generous offer. I'll take 999000 and leave you with 1000.  We can negotiate further if you think it's too low.
I'll give you a decent amount, but I'm not going to be generous just yet. Let's see if you'll take this offer!
I'm willing to negotiate, but I won't accept a deal that's so lopsided in your favor.  This offer is a 60/40 split,  let's try to find something more equitable.
I'll meet you halfway, but I'm not going to give you more than 50%
I'm willing to compromise and move closer to your proposal, but I still need a more balanced share. This offer splits the money 55/45, let's see if we can reach an agreement.
